column1: So the old goat went on her way into the dark woods.She had not been gone long when there came a loud rap at the door
column2: and a voice cried: "Open the door
column3: my dear children. I have something here for each of you."But the young kids knew by the rough voice that this was the old wolf. So one of them said
column4: "We shall not open the door. Our mother's voice is soft and gentle. Your voice is rough. You are a wolf."The old wolf ran away to a shop
column5: where he ate a piece of white chalk to make his voice soft. Then he went back to the goat's hut and rapped at the door. He spoke in a soft voice and said
column7: my dear children. I am your mother."But the oldest little goat thought of what his mother had said."If you are our mother
column8: put your foot on the window sill
column9: that we may see it."When the wolf had done this
column10: all the little goats cried out
column12: you are not our mother. We shall not open the door."
